The bracelet consists of two parallel rows of small, uniformly sized, clear, faceted stones, likely rhinestones or crystals, set closely together in a flexible, silver-toned metal band. The stones sparkle brightly, reflecting light. This sophisticated piece offers timeless elegance with brilliant sparkle. Your donation helps fund our awareness and support programs.

products.title: Silver rhinestone butterfly charm bracelet
products.description: Glamorous rhinestone-encrusted butterfly bracelet. The bracelet appears to be made of a silver-toned metal, heavily encrusted with clear, faceted rhinestones or crystals, giving it a very sparkly and reflective appearance. The central feature is a large, intricate butterfly charm. The butterfly's wings are outlined in silver-toned metal and filled with numerous small, clear rhinestones, creating a dazzling effect. The body of the butterfly is also adorned with rhinestones. The band of the bracelet consists of a single row of individually set, clear, square or rectangular rhinestones, forming a flexible chain. This chain wraps around the wrist. On the left side of the butterfly charm, there is a short, multi-strand dangling chain. This chain appears to be composed of several delicate silver-toned chains, possibly with small, flat, rectangular or square metallic pieces interspersed, adding movement and extra sparkle. This glamorous piece combines a delicate butterfly charm with brilliant rhinestone sparkle. Your donation helps fund our awareness and support programs.

products.title: Pink brown black BADDIE letter beaded bracelet
products.description: Trendy beaded bracelet with letter beads spelling "BADDIE". The bracelet is a stretch-style beaded bracelet. The majority of the bracelet consists of flat, disc-shaped beads (heishi beads). These beads are primarily a soft, pastel pink, with sections of brown and black beads interspersed. Centrally located on the bracelet are white, flat, disc-shaped letter beads with gold lettering that spell out the word "BADDIE". Gold-colored metallic spacer beads are present, some appearing as simple rings, others as small, cylindrical beads with a textured or possibly rhinestone-encrusted surface, adding a touch of sparkle. The bracelet features a warm and soft color palette of pink, various shades of brown (light to dark), black, white, and gold. This trendy and personalized piece combines colorful heishi beads with a bold, empowering word spelled out in letter beads, accented with metallic gold elements. Your donation helps fund our awareness and support programs.

products.title: White red gold beaded bracelet
products.description: Elegant beaded bracelet with a repeating pattern. The bracelet features a repeating pattern of three distinct bead types. Numerous flat, opaque white disc-shaped beads (heishi beads) form the majority of the bracelet's band. Several translucent, deep red, faceted beads are interspersed. These beads appear to be bicone or barrel-shaped, catching and reflecting light. Small, shiny, metallic gold spherical beads act as spacers, separating the white and red bead sections. The pattern seems to alternate between segments of white disc beads and sections containing red faceted beads flanked by gold spherical beads. This sophisticated piece combines classic white with bold red and warm gold accents. Your donation helps fund our awareness and support programs.
